title: Snowman Paul returns to the Winter Olympics: An Winter Olympics Book for Kids
description: Step into the Winter Olympics Spirit with Snowman Paul!The Winter Games are the most exciting sports spectacle on earth.They present an opportunity to teach our children important lessons about fair competition and honesty in sports.In this rhyming and stunningly illustrated Olympic adventure, Snowman Paul faces a difficult choice that will affect his relationship with his best friends. Will Snowman Paul make the right decisionThis Olympic story told in verse will be enjoyed by children, parents, and grandparents alike.It is a fun and educational way to prepare your kids for the fast-approaching 2022 Winter Games.It is a fun read-aloud, a perfect bedtime story, and it will inspire your young athletes all year long."The Snowman Paul book series will hook, engage and delight your little ones and make them fall in love with reading." Alinka Rutkowska, USA Today best-selling authorScroll up and grab your copy now!* Make sure to see the other two Olympics-themed volumes in the award-winning Snowman Paul series:1. Snowman Paul at the Winter Olympics2. Snowman Paul and Kate's Olympic Dream
author: Yossi Lapid
